resources.string: Detection and Prevention of Paddy Diseases
Vivekanand Education Societyâ€™s Institute Of Technology
Vivekanand Education Society\'s Institute of Technology also known as VESIT or V.E.S. Institute of Technology, established in 1984, is an engineering college affiliated with the University of Mumbai.
The Mahatma Phule Krishi Vidyapeeth (MPKV), Rahuri is the premier Agricultural University in Maharashtra that renders services to the farmers through Education, Research and Extension Education.

Agricare is the app which is designed by VESIT students in collabration with MPKV to detect,analyze and predict paddy dieases in languages comfortable with farmers and will be economical,maintance free and independent of internet usage.
